full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,NGO MTSAR RTOGS BYED NAG 'GROS SU BKOD PA LEGS BSHAD 'PHRUL GYI LDE MIG CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): DBYANGS CAN DGA' BA'I BLO GROS,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI RIG GNAS LA BLO GROS KYI 'JUG PA MCHOG TU YANGS PA'I DAD BRTZON RNAM DPYOD PHUL DU BYUNG BA SOGS YON TAN DU MAS BRGYAN PA DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS NAN TAN CHEN POS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, MKHAS SHING GRUB PA'I DBANG PHYUG CHEN PO RJE BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS DPAL BZANG PO'I ZHAL SNGA NAS KYI BKA' DRIN LAS, ,RIG GNAS 'DI'I DON SMRA BA'I SPOBS PA CUNG ZAD THOB PA'I BYA BRAL RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA BLO BZANG DON GRUB BAM MING GZHAN DBYANGS CAN DGA' BA'I BLO GROS SU BOD PAS RJE BLA MA'I 'KHRUNGS GNAS SKU 'BUM BYAMS PA GLING DU SBYAR BA DGE LEGS SU GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,)
